message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value for us, but considering its importance to you, we believe it's time to make this a reality. We propose to sell the product to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer represents a significant saving compared to its intrinsic worth and provides you with a unique chance to secure an asset valued at $1,200,000 by you. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
